full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,HR'I: DAM LDAN 'DA STER CHA DRI BA'I SKOR, ,'DZAM GLING BRGYAN GCIG MDZES PA'I GLU DGAR DE, ,NYI MA'I GNYEN GYI 'BRAS BU BSTAN 'GRO'I CHED, ,RIM GYIS BRGYUD PA'I LUNG RTOGS RTZE NYID DU, ,YID 'DOM 'BAD BRJES DE YI 'THUS 'GRO ZHING, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES AIRTI NI BI SHRIL THU MERGEN PAndI TA ^TSE SPEL DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE'I 'KHRUNGS RABS DANG 'BREL BA'I GSOL 'DEBS ZHABS BRTAN SMON TSIG 'DI NI, GUNG BDE LEGS RDO RJE'I SHOG SER SKYA THUN MONG DANG, CHED GNYER GYI MI SNA DGE 'DUN DANG BSOD NAMS BCAS KYIS, SNGAR ^PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS MDZAD PA'I 'KHRUNGS GSOL DANG, ^RGYAL DBANG MCHOG NAS STZAL BA'I BKA' SHOG DANG, ^GLING SPRUL SKUS MDZAD PA'I 'KHRUNGS GSOL DANG, @005A *, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN BSRUNG CHEN PO ^RGYAL CHEN BSE KHRAB CAN GYIS LUNG BSTAN PA 'DI RNAMS LAS RGYAS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SNGON DU RGYAL DBANG YAB SRAS SOGS KYIS JI LTAR STZAL BAR GZHI BRTEN, GSAR DU CUNG ZAD PHYE STE, ^RGYAL CHEN BSE KHRAB CAN GYIS DAD PAS 'PHRAL DU SMRAS PA'O,, ^CHOS SKYONG RIN PO CHES MDZAD PA'I 'KHRUNGS GSOL 'DI NI, RGYAL DBANG RIN PO CHE NAS STZAL BA'I BKA' SHOG LA, SKYE SPRUL GYI ZLOS GAR RIM DANG GCIG CAR BYUNG BAS RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR ZHVA SER COD PAN 'CHANG BA'I RING LUGS 'DZIN SPEL GYI LHAG BSAM SNYING STOBS MI DMAN PA'I BKUR 'OS RNAMS LA BSAM, 'DI NAS ZHES PA SOGS DANG, GRUB DBANG KLONG BRDOL RIN PO CHE'I GSUNG 'BUM DU RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I SKU 'PHRENG SO GNYIS GSUNG BA SOGS DANG, MTHUN TSANGS CHE BAS DGA' SPRO GNAS SU BYA'O,, ,,)
